statements: SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth, gender FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT last_name, ethnicity FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM PatientDemographics WHERE date_of_birth >= '1980-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM PatientDemographics WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian' AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND date_of_birth < '1970-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT ethnicity FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_age >= 30;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY patient_name ASC, patient_age DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_age > 30 AND patient_gender = 'Female'
SELECT pd.patient_id, pd.patient_name, pr.report_type FROM patient_demographics pd INNER JOIN patient_reports pr ON pd.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE pr.report_type = 'X-RAY'
SELECT pd.patient_name, pr.report_date, pr.report_description FROM patient_demographics pd LEFT JOIN patient_reports pr ON pd.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE pd.patient_age >= 40
SELECT AVG(patient_age), COUNT(patient_id) FROM patient_demographics GROUP BY patient_gender HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 1
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT facility_name, city, state FROM facilities
SELECT facility_name, address, city, state, zipcode FROM facilities WHERE state = 'California'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis='Cancer' AND treatment_plan='Chemotherapy';
SELECT facility_name, city, state FROM facilities WHERE state='CA';
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.diagnosis, f.facility_name FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN facilities f ON f.facility_id = m.record_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE race = 'Asian';
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hospitals WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM hospitals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT first_name, last_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT insurance_company, policy_number, coverage_amount FROM health_insurance WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, last_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY last_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND ethnicity = 'Caucasian';

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, h.hospital_name FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id JOIN hospitals h ON d.hospital = h.hospital_name WHERE a.appointment_type = 'Follow-up' AND a.status = 'Confirmed';

SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, first_name, last_name, specialty FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE d.specialty = 'Cardiology';

SELECT h.hospital_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM hospitals h JOIN doctors d ON h.hospital_name = d.hospital JOIN appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id WHERE a.status = 'Confirmed' GROUP BY h.hospital_name ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
